message.content:
cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with inferring connectivity in neural circuits using calcium imaging, which is a topic related to neural networks and computational neuroscience. Therefore, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves image processing and computer vision techniques, which suggests cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) as the second likely sub-category. The proposed method involves Bayesian inference and statistical learning, which are topics related to machine learning, suggesting cs.LG (Machine Learning) as the third likely sub-category. The paper also involves dynamical systems and control theory, which suggests cs.SY (Systems and Control) as the fourth likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves signal processing and information theory, which suggests cs.IT (Information Theory) as the fifth likely sub-category.
